properties.name: ContainerName
properties.help: The container to attach to. If omitted, the first container in the container group will be chosen.

properties.name: Ids
properties.help: One or more resource IDs (space-delimited). If provided, no other 'Resource Id' arguments should be specified.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the container group.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: CommandLine
properties.help: The command line to run when the container is started, e.g. '/bin/bash -c myscript.sh'.

properties.name: Cpu
properties.help: The required number of CPU cores of the containers, accurate to one decimal place.

properties.name: DnsNameLabel
properties.help: The dns name label for container group with public IP.

properties.name: AzureEnvironmentVariables
properties.help: A list of environment variable for the container. Space-separated values in 'key=value' format.

properties.name: File
properties.help: The path to the input file.

properties.name: Image
properties.help: The container image name.

properties.name: IpAddress
properties.help: The IP address type of the container group.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=&lt;location&gt;`.

properties.name: Memory
properties.help: The required memory of the containers in GB, accurate to one decimal place.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the container group.

properties.name: NoWait
properties.help: Do not wait for the long-running operation to finish.

properties.name: OsType
properties.help: The OS type of the containers.

properties.name: Ports
properties.help: The ports to open.

properties.name: Protocol
properties.help: The network protocol to use.

properties.name: RestartPolicy
properties.help: Restart policy for all containers within the container group.

properties.name: Secrets
properties.help: Space-separated secrets in 'key=value' format.

properties.name: SecretsMountPath
properties.help: The path within the container where the secrets volume should be mounted. Must not contain colon ':'.

properties.name: SecureEnvironmentVariables
properties.help: A list of secure environment variable for the container. Space-separated values in 'key=value' format.

properties.name: AzureFileVolumeAccountKey
properties.help: The storage account access key used to access the Azure File share.

properties.name: AzureFileVolumeAccountName
properties.help: The name of the storage account that contains the Azure File share.

properties.name: AzureFileVolumeMountPath
properties.help: The path within the container where the azure file volume should be mounted. Must not contain colon ':'.

properties.name: AzureFileVolumeShareName
properties.help: The name of the Azure File share to be mounted as a volume.

properties.name: GitrepoDir
properties.help: The target directory path in the git repository. Must not contain '..'.

properties.name: GitrepoMountPath
properties.help: The path within the container where the git repo volume should be mounted. Must not contain colon ':'.

properties.name: GitrepoRevision
properties.help: The commit hash for the specified revision.

properties.name: GitrepoUrl
properties.help: The URL of a git repository to be mounted as a volume.

properties.name: RegistryLoginServer
properties.help: The container image registry login server.

properties.name: RegistryPassword
properties.help: The password to log in container image registry server.

properties.name: RegistryUsername
properties.help: The username to log in container image registry server.

properties.name: LogAnalyticsWorkspace
properties.help: The Log Analytics workspace name or id. Use the current subscription or use --subscription flag to set the desired subscription.

properties.name: LogAnalyticsWorkspaceKey
properties.help: The Log Analytics workspace key.

properties.name: AssignIdentity
properties.help: Space-separated list of assigned identities. Assigned identities are either user assigned identities (resource IDs) and / or the system assigned identity ('[system]'). See examples for more info.

properties.name: Role
properties.help: Role name or id the system assigned identity will have.

properties.name: Scope
properties.help: Scope that the system assigned identity can access.

properties.name: NetworkProfile
properties.help: The network profile name or id.

properties.name: Subnet
properties.help: The name of the subnet when creating a new VNET or referencing an existing one. Can also reference an existing subnet by ID.

properties.name: SubnetAddressPrefix
properties.help: The subnet IP address prefix to use when creating a new VNET in CIDR format.

properties.name: Vnet
properties.help: The name of the VNET when creating a new one or referencing an existing one. Can also reference an existing vnet by ID. This allows using vnets from other resource groups.

properties.name: VnetAddressPrefix
properties.help: The IP address prefix to use when creating a new VNET in CIDR format.

properties.name: VnetName
properties.help: The name of the VNET when creating a new one or referencing an existing one.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Yes
properties.help: Do not prompt for confirmation.

properties.name: Ids
properties.help: One or more resource IDs (space-delimited). If provided, no other 'Resource Id' arguments should be specified.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the container group.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: ExecCommand
properties.help: The command to run from within the container.

properties.name: ContainerName
properties.help: The container name where to execute the command. Can be ommitted for container groups with only one container.

properties.name: TerminalColSize
properties.help: The col size for the command output.

properties.name: TerminalRowSize
properties.help: The row size for the command output.

properties.name: Ids
properties.help: One or more resource IDs (space-delimited). If provided, no other 'Resource Id' arguments should be specified.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the container group.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: File
properties.help: The file path to export the container group.

properties.name: ContainerName
properties.help: The container name to tail the logs. If omitted, the first container in the container group will be chosen.

properties.name: Follow
properties.help: Indicate to stream the tailing logs.

commonTaskProperties.name: Debug
commonTaskProperties.help: Increase logging verbosity to show all debug logs.

commonTaskProperties.name: Help
commonTaskProperties.help: Show this help message and exit.

commonTaskProperties.name: Query
commonTaskProperties.help: JMESPath query string. See http://jmespath.org/ for more information and examples.

commonTaskProperties.name: Verbose
commonTaskProperties.help: Increase logging verbosity. Use --debug for full debug logs.
